name: Drowned Beef Sandwich with Chipotle Sauce (Torta Ahogada)
author: bd.weld
summary: Served with a spicy beef broth for dipping, these roast beef sandwiches on crusty rolls - a variation on a traditional Mexican 'drowned sandwich' -make a hearty lunch or quick dinner.
ingredients: 12 ounces chipotle cooking sauce (such a Knorr®)
1 pound thinly sliced deli roast beef
4  bolillo rolls, halved and lightly toasted
4 sprigs fresh cilantro, or to taste  (Optional)
directions: Combine chipotle cooking sauce, beef broth, and 1/4 cup chopped cilantro in a saucepan; bring to a boil
Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer, stirring occasionally, for 10 minutes
Heat oil in a skillet over medium-high heat; saute onion until softened, about 5 minutes
Stir garlic into onion and cook for 1 minute
Add roast beef and 1/4 cup chipotle sauce mixture and cook, stirring constantly, until heated through, about 2 minutes
Ladle remaining chipotle sauce mixture into 4 bowls for dipping
Spoon roast beef mixture onto the bottom half of each bun, top with a cilantro sprig, and place the top on each bun
